name: Minecart Chase
summary: Harrison Jones, a world famous archeologist, has found mystic 'Frozen Diamond' in the shadow of Temple. but army of darkness want it too. When he escape from temple, though, army of darkness also found him, Now it's up to him caring 'Frozen Diamond' From temple to UFO before it's too late. He has a mine cart with speed and diamond energy will give you boost speed.
